text: The Sharmin and Bijan Mossavar-Rahmani Center for Iran and Persian Gulf Studies logo The Sharmin and Bijan Mossavar-Rahmani Center for Iran and Persian Gulf Studies () is a study center department at Princeton University.«Princeton University | Postdoctoral Positions, Sharmin and Bijan Mossavar-Rahmani Center for Iran and Persian Gulf Studies» at a The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill website. Retrieved July 29, 2016. Its aim is to support teaching and research of Iran and Persian Gulf studies and to create and support productive and innovative connections across departments throughout the University. The Sharmin and Bijan Mossavar-Rahmani Center for Iran and Persian Gulf Studies at Princeton University .
